taskDefinition.name: BMC ITSM9 Change Templated Create
taskDefinition.author: support@kineticdata.com
taskDefinition.description: Creates a BMC ITSM9 Infrastructure Change record that contains the Id of the triggering Kinetic Request submission and the task instance deferral token using the specified Change Template and data parameters provided.

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Change Template Name:
parameter.tooltip: The name of the change template to be used. Change templates are retrieved from CHG:Template.

parameter.label: Requester First Name:
parameter.tooltip: Used to find the Requester for the Requester tab under the Requested By header.

parameter.label: Requester Last Name:
parameter.tooltip: Used to find the Requester for the Requester tab under the Requested By header.

parameter.label: Requester Login ID:
parameter.tooltip: Used to find the Requester for the Requester tab under the Requested By header.

parameter.label: Requester Support Company:
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Support Company on the Requester tab under the Requested By header.

parameter.label: Submitter Login Id:
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Submitter on the Dates tab under the Change Dates header.

parameter.label: Change Manager Support Company:
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Support Company on the Assignment tab under the Infrastructure Change Manage header.

parameter.label: Change Manager Support Organization
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Support Organization on the Assignment tab under the Infrastructure Change Manage header.

parameter.label: Change Manager Support Group Name
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Support Group Name on the Assignment tab under the Infrastructure Change Manage header.

parameter.label: Survey ID (KSR #):
parameter.tooltip: The value placed in the SRID field on the Change form.

parameter.label: Survey Instance ID:
parameter.tooltip: The value placed in the SRInstanceID field on the Change form.
